hero_section.description: Entrepreneur and freelance full-stack Typescript developer dedicated to your business

services_section.title: Custom web application and website development
services_section.description: Services I offer, from traditional development for more flexibility to no-code with Webflow for simplicity and speed, including Search Engine Optimization (SEO).

web_development.title: Website and Web Application Development
web_development.description: Development from a provided graphic mockup or one that I create with you, transforming it into a web project. I pay particular attention to UX, optimization, and web accessibility. I build landing pages, blogs, portfolios, showcase sites, and web applications (SaaS, etc.).

seo.title: Google SEO
seo.description: Optimizing your website/web application for organic ranking on Google and other search engines (SEO).

web_design.title: Web Design
web_design.description: Creating your design and branding with Figma, including wireframing, mockups, or directly on Webflow.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Auditing and improving the accessibility of your website, adhering to WCAG standards.

experience_section.title: My Experience
experience_section.description: Former paratrooper passionate about web development and entrepreneurship, I transitioned to freelance web development. I'm also developing my own software, notably LinkerFlow, my current project.

experiences.title: LinkerFlow, Webflow SaaS Tool
experiences.description: I developed LinkerFlow, a Webflow tool designed to automate internal linking, a crucial yet time-consuming SEO method.

experiences.title: JS Developer Training, Wild Code School
experiences.description: I completed a 5-month intensive web developer training (Feb–July 2024), learning React, Express, Node.js, MySQL, Git/Github, web accessibility, Agile methodologies like Scrum, and teamwork across several projects.

experiences.title: Agence No Code, My Webflow Agency
experiences.description: From late 2023 to 2024, I worked hard to acquire clients as a freelance Webflow developer, applying my SEO skills to grow my own agency website (Agence No Code), where I now collaborate with partners as a freelancer.

experiences.title: Spylead, Tech Product Listing Site
experiences.description: I developed Spylead, a Webflow-based tech product listing website, covering tools like Google Maps scrapers and IP address providers.

experiences.title: Freelance Webflow Developer
experiences.description: After finishing my contract, I self-taught Webflow and offered my services as a freelance Webflow developer.

experiences.title: Paratrooper, French Air Force
experiences.description: After more than a year in reserve, I enlisted as a trainee pilot in the French Air Force in 2017. Seeking more physical activity and action, I switched specialties to paratroopers, undertaking extensive training over more than six years of service.

technologies_section.title: Cutting-edge technologies I master
technologies_section.description: All languages, libraries, and frameworks—code or no-code—that I know and offer as services. I'm always open to exploring and learning new technologies to match your project's needs!

projects_section.title: Awesome projects I've built
projects_section.description: Projects I've created during training, for myself, and as a freelancer

contact.title: A crazy project? Let's discuss it:
contact.description: Whether you're a business, independent professional, or just curious about web development, don't hesitate to contact me. You can reach me by email or through the form, and I'll respond as soon as possible!

footer.description: The web development at the service of your business

blog.title: My blog
blog.description: The articles I write to share my knowledge and experiences
